titleStmt.title: Helps for suddain accidents endangering life By which those that liue farre from physitions or chirurgions may happily preserue the life of a poore friend or neighbour, till such a man may be had to perfect the cure. Collected out of the best authours for the generall good, by Stephen Bradvvell. physition.
titleStmt.author: Bradwell, Stephen.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, for T. S[later] and are to be sold by Henry Overton in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: With a final leaf of advertisement to the reader.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
